con:request.name: AddAchToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddAchToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ABANumber>${PersonalCheckABA}</acr2:ABANumber>\r <acr2:AccountNumber>${PersonalCheckAccount}</acr2:AccountNumber>\r <acr2:AccountType>Checking</acr2:AccountType>\r <acr2:BirthDay xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CheckType>Personal</acr2:CheckType>\r <acr2:City>Miami</acr2:City>\r <acr2:DriversNumber>${CustomerDriversNumber}</acr2:DriversNumber>\r <acr2:FirstName>${CustomerName}</acr2:FirstName>\r <acr2:LastName>E</acr2:LastName>\r <acr2:Phone>9095223269</acr2:Phone>\r <acr2:State>FL</acr2:State>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddAchToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ModifyAchToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ModifyAchToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>je003</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>jon.ath.an@cenp.os</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId>${AddAchToken#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //ns1:AddAchTokenResponse[1]/ns1:AddAchTokenResult[1]/a:TokenId[1]}</acr2:TokenId>\r <acr2:ABANumber>${PersonalCheckABA}</acr2:ABANumber>\r <acr2:AccountNumber>${PersonalCheckAccount}</acr2:AccountNumber>\r <acr2:AccountType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:BirthDay xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CheckType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:City xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:FirstName>Josefino</acr2:FirstName>\r <acr2:LastName>Rodriguez</acr2:LastName>\r <acr2:Phone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:State>FL</acr2:State>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ModifyAchToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteAchToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:DeleteAchToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId>${AddAchToken#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //ns1:AddAchTokenResponse[1]/ns1:AddAchTokenResult[1]/a:TokenId[1]}</acr2:TokenId>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:DeleteAchToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ModifyCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ModifyCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>123 Races Rd</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode>\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmailFake}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode>12345</acr2:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr2:TokenId>\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate>1230</acr2:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr2:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard>Jon Star</acr2:NameOnCard>\r <acr2:TaxExempt>true</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ModifyCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:DeleteCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //ns1:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/ns1:AddCardTokenResult[1]/a:TokenId[1]}</acr2:TokenId>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:DeleteCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Sale
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v3.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
